= Mac OS X Contributor Steps =

Follow these steps on Mac OS X to use Subversion (SVN) to access the Snap Backup source code and submit your changes.

== One-Time Setup ==
1) Install SVN
Download the _openCollabNet_ file and for Mac OS X at: `http://subversion.tigris.org/getting.html#binary-packages`
Run the program to install SVN.

2) Get Password
Get your personal Google Code password at: http://code.google.com/hosting/settings

3) Download Code Repository
From Finder, go to Applications:Utilities and launch Terminal.  Then enter the following commands:
   `$ mk ~/Projects`
   `$ cd ~/Projects`
   `$ svn checkout https://snapbackup.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ snapbackup --username <YOUR USERNAME>`
Replace <YOUR USERNAME NAME> with your personal Google Code username.
